definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Proline contents were related to leaf age and species.
sentences.chinese: 叶片脯氨酸的含量与叶龄和植物种类有关。

sentences.english: Hydroxyproline was measured in lung tissue homogenates by spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 采用分光光度法测定肺组织匀浆羟脯氨酸含量。

sentences.english: The water and hydroxyproline content of the discs did not change appreciably.
sentences.chinese: 水和羟脯氨酸含量改变略微。

sentences.english: Hydroxyproline was determined by chloramines T method.
sentences.chinese: 用氯胺T法测心肌组织羟脯氨酸的含量。

sentences.english: Furthermore, it can increase the soluble sugar content and free-proline content in leaves.
sentences.chinese: 盐分胁迫还使叶片中的脯氨酸和可溶性糖含量增加。

sentences.english: It also contains high concentrations of proline and hydroxyproline.
sentences.chinese: 它还含有高浓度的脯氨酸和羟脯氨酸。

sentences.english: It also contains high concentrations of proline and hydroxyproline.
sentences.chinese: 它还含有高浓度的脯氨酸和羟脯氨酸。

sentences.english: Salt of proline derivative, solvate thereof, and production method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 脯氨酸衍生物的盐，其溶剂合物，及其生产方法。

sentences.english: Pro-Gly was least effective in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 脯氨酸甘氨酸在这方面作用较低。

sentences.english: The changing trend of soluble sugar content was similar with that of praline.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性糖含量的变化趋势与脯氨酸相似。

sentences.english: Spice-based flavored coffee can either be cinnamon hazelnut or cinnamon almond praline.
sentences.chinese: 香料基肉桂风味咖啡要么榛子或杏仁肉桂脯氨酸。

sentences.english: CaCl2 stress improved the content of soluble sugar and proline in Ophiopogon japonicas leaves, too.
sentences.chinese: 钙盐胁迫也可使可溶性总糖和游离脯氨酸含量升高。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, urine calcium and hydroxyproline concentrations were examined as well.
sentences.chinese: 同时测定尿中的钙和羟脯氨酸的含量。

sentences.english: The increase of proline content in hybrid rice was more than that in traditional rice.
sentences.chinese: 杂交稻脯氨酸含量上升的趋势大于常规稻。
